pages.text: Runedroppers are Scalar Utils 5's alternatives to elevators, that allow you to absorb a set number of blocks worth of fall damage
Above are the crafting recipes to acquire a Basic Runedropper and an Advanced Runedropper.
Above are the crafting recipes to acquire an Elite Runedropper and an Ultimate Runedropper.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Transcendent Runedropper.
